ValidationRule.description: Check if Customer Struggle is populated with accurate options when case is closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name='New Standard Case', (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed")), OR( ISPICKVAL(Customer_Struggle__c ,"Phone Case - please complete"), ISPICKVAL( Customer_Struggle__c ,"System - please review"), ISPICKVAL( Customer_Struggle__c ,"Webform case - please review")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please note the Value entered in the "Customer Struggle" is invalid for Case Closure
